Dear Friends:

We in the Greater Boston Alliance for 911 Truth and Justice are very excited to bring Professor Emeritus Dr. David Ray Griffin back to the Boston area. On May 8, 2010 at 7pm, Dr. Griffin will give his presentation at the Harvard Epworth United Methodist Church, 1555 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA 02138 [see the attached poster and press alert].



He will speak the truth, something the media monopoly does not provide you on the paramount issue of war. His lecture title is “Is the War in Afghanistan Justified by the Events of 9/11?” This is the last stop in his 2010, 15-city US tour which starts tonight April 23, 2010 and includes stops in the Midwest and Northeast.



Please come and listen if you have ears.

Happy spring,

Rich

When his cause succeeds however, the timid join him, for then it costs nothing to be a Patriot.” - Mark Twain
